contentencoded: We do our share of statistics and numbers and the like on this broadcast.  But every now and then we figure it's good to break through a little bit to talk to people who live and work out in the actual economy.  We check back in with Austin Golding of Golding Barge Line about life during the government shutdown, America's energy production and about running a business in times of uncertainty.
title: Barge owner talks oil and uncertainty
teaser: Marketplace checks back in with Austin Golding, co-owner of Golding Barges Line in Mississippi.
description: Marketplace checks back in with Austin Golding, co-owner of Golding Barges Line in Mississippi.
